reviewText: Wonderful series and so glad there is an English option to choose from at the beginning.  I've traveled to China a number of times, and this series goes beyond the typical tourist venues to the real China and it's culture and people.  It really makes you appreciative of the work that goes into one of the world's best culinary traditions.

I understand why theses DVD's got some awards. It's not really about cooking, no recipes are explained. But it's more about local food and tradition in deep deep China. It really makes you want to travel and meet all these people and taste all that food.
